title: Otome Teki Shindoromu
alternative_title: 乙女的シンドローム ; Otome-teki Syndrome
status: 乙女的シンドローム ; Otome-teki Syndrome
description:
Description :
        Tachibana Otome, a 16 years old otaku whose type of guy was "Blonde Hair and Blue Eyes" suddenly meet the that sort of person in real life....... How will it go for her?
